format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "
\t\t\t\t

Sales Invoice

{{ _(doc.name) }}\t\t\t\t

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "date", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "Date"}, {"fieldname": "customer_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Customer Name"}, {"fieldname": "customer_phone_number", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Customer Phone Number"}, {"fieldname": "items", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Items", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "product", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "quantity", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "price", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}]}, {"fieldname": "total", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Total"}, {"fieldname": "payment_method", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Payment Method"}, {"fieldname": "shop", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Shop"}]
html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%}
{% set shop = frappe.get_doc("Shop", doc.shop) %}

{{ shop.shop_name }}

{{ shop.location }}

{% if shop.phone_number %}

Tel: {{ shop.phone_number }}

{% endif %} {% if shop.email %}

Email: {{ shop.email }}

{% endif %}

SALES INVOICE

{{ doc.name }}

Date: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}

Bill To:

{{ doc.customer_name }}

{% if doc.customer_phone_number %}

Phone: {{ doc.customer_phone_number }}

{% endif %}
{% for item in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
Item Quantity Price Amount
{{ item.product }} {{ item.quantity }} {{ frappe.format_value(item.price, {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }} {{ frappe.format_value(item.price * item.quantity, {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }}
Total {{ doc.get_formatted("total") }}

Payment Information:

Method: {{ doc.payment_method }}

Thank you for shopping with us!

{% if doc.docstatus == 1 %}

Generated by Tookio Shop

{% endif %}
name: Tookio Sales Invoice
